projects.title: JobFit
projects.description: A comprehensive job matching and recommendation platform that uses AI to connect job seekers with suitable opportunities.
projects.longDescription: JobFit is an intelligent job matching platform that analyzes user skills and preferences to recommend the most suitable job opportunities. It features resume parsing, skill assessment, and personalized job recommendations to streamline the job search process.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, animated portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills using React and GSAP.
projects.longDescription: This portfolio website features modern design principles with interactive animations, responsive layouts, and dynamic content. It showcases projects, skills, and professional experience with a focus on performance and user experience. Built with React and enhanced with GSAP animations, the site provides a seamless browsing experience across all devices.

projects.title: Virtual Mouse using OpenCV
projects.description: A computer vision project that allows controlling the mouse cursor using hand gestures detected by a webcam.
projects.longDescription: This project utilizes OpenCV and Python to create a virtual mouse system controlled by hand gestures. The application tracks hand movements using a webcam and translates them into mouse cursor movements on screen. It includes gesture recognition for click, scroll, and drag operations.
features: Mouse cursor control with hand movements
Click, scroll, and drag gesture recognition

projects.title: HawksEye
projects.description: A comprehensive surveillance and security system that leverages computer vision for threat detection and monitoring.
projects.longDescription: HawksEye is an advanced surveillance system that uses computer vision algorithms to detect potential security threats in real-time. The system can identify suspicious activities, unauthorized access, and potential security breaches, providing immediate alerts to security personnel.

projects.title: Brilliant Pro LMS
projects.description: A comprehensive Learning Management System that provides tools for course creation, student management, and educational content delivery.
projects.longDescription: Brilliant Pro LMS is a complete learning management solution designed for educational institutions and corporate training programs. It offers features for course creation, content management, student tracking, and assessment tools to facilitate effective online learning experiences.

projects.title: Vehicle Buy Sell Platform
projects.description: An Angular-based platform for buying and selling vehicles with comprehensive listing, search, and transaction capabilities.
projects.longDescription: This vehicle buying and selling platform provides a user-friendly interface for listing vehicles, searching for available options, and managing transactions. It includes features for detailed vehicle listings, user authentication, messaging between buyers and sellers, and transaction management.
features: Detailed vehicle listings with multiple images

projects.title: Event Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive solution for planning, organizing, and managing events of all sizes with features for registration, scheduling, and attendance tracking.
projects.longDescription: The Event Management System streamlines the entire event planning and management process. It provides tools for creating events, managing registrations, scheduling sessions, tracking attendance, and generating reports. The system is designed to be versatile and can handle events of various types and sizes.

projects.title: PHY E-learning App
projects.description: A mobile application designed to make learning physics engaging and interactive through visualizations, simulations, and interactive problem-solving.
projects.longDescription: PHY is a comprehensive e-learning mobile application focused on making physics education accessible and engaging. It features interactive simulations, 3D visualizations of physics concepts, problem-solving tools, and comprehensive course content covering various physics topics for high school and university students.

projects.title: Simple Translator in Python
projects.description: A translator application that supports multiple languages and provides efficient text translation capabilities.
projects.longDescription: Simple Translator is a Python-based application that offers quick and reliable text translation between multiple languages. It features a clean interface, language detection, and utilizes advanced translation APIs to provide accurate translations for various text formats.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
projects.description: A fun, interactive implementation of the classic Rock Paper Scissors game with a computer opponent.
projects.longDescription: This project is an interactive implementation of the classic Rock Paper Scissors game, featuring a computer opponent with various difficulty levels. The game includes a user-friendly interface, score tracking, game history, and customizable game modes for an engaging gaming experience.

projects.title: QR Code Generator
projects.description: A versatile tool for generating customizable QR codes for various applications such as URLs, contact information, and text.
projects.longDescription: This QR Code Generator allows users to create customized QR codes for different types of data including URLs, contact information, text, and more. It offers features for adjusting QR code size, error correction level, and design customization to meet specific requirements and brand guidelines.
features: Multiple QR code data formats support

projects.title: Pose Detection
projects.description: A computer vision application that detects and tracks human body poses in real-time using advanced AI models.
projects.longDescription: This Pose Detection project utilizes computer vision and machine learning to detect and track human body poses in real-time. It can identify key body landmarks and track movements, making it useful for applications in fitness, physical therapy, sports analysis, and interactive gaming. The system works with both images and video inputs.
features: Support for multiple people in frame
Integration with fitness and health applications

projects.title: Graphical Password Authentication System
projects.description: An innovative authentication system that utilizes graphical elements instead of traditional text passwords for enhanced security and memorability.
projects.longDescription: The Graphical Password Authentication System offers an alternative to traditional text-based passwords by using images and graphical elements for authentication. This approach enhances security while making passwords more memorable for users. The system includes multiple authentication methods such as image sequence selection, pattern drawing, and point-click sequences.

projects.title: Video to GIF Converter
projects.description: A tool that converts video files into animated GIFs with customizable settings for frame rate, quality, and dimensions.
projects.longDescription: This Video to GIF Converter allows users to transform video clips into animated GIFs with full control over the output settings. Users can adjust frame rate, quality, dimensions, and even add effects or captions to the resulting GIFs. The tool supports various video formats and provides optimization for different use cases like social media sharing or web embedding.

projects.title: The Ripple Effect
projects.description: An Ethereum-based fundraising platform that leverages blockchain technology for transparent and secure donations.
projects.longDescription: The Ripple Effect is a blockchain-based fundraising platform built on Ethereum that revolutionizes charitable giving through transparency and security. The app allows donors to track exactly how their contributions are being used, ensures funds reach intended recipients, and eliminates intermediaries. It features smart contracts for automated fund distribution and provides verification of project outcomes.
features: Smart contract implementation for fund management

projects.title: Instagram Profile Details
projects.description: A tool that extracts and analyzes public profile information from Instagram accounts.
projects.longDescription: This Instagram Profile Details tool provides insights into public Instagram profiles by extracting available data and presenting it in an organized manner. It can gather information such as follower count, engagement rates, posting frequency, and hashtag usage. The tool respects Instagram's terms of service by only accessing publicly available information.

projects.title: Image to Sketch
projects.description: A creative tool that converts photographs into artistic sketches with adjustable parameters for style customization.
projects.longDescription: Image to Sketch is a creative image processing tool that transforms photographs into artistic sketch-like renderings. Users can adjust various parameters such as line weight, detail level, and contrast to achieve different artistic styles. The application provides real-time preview and supports multiple output formats for digital art creation or traditional printing.

projects.title: Virtual Drag And Drop Using OpenCV
projects.description: A computer vision project that enables drag-and-drop functionality using hand gestures captured through a webcam.
projects.longDescription: This project uses OpenCV and computer vision techniques to create a virtual drag-and-drop interface controlled by hand gestures. Users can interact with on-screen objects by making specific hand movements captured via webcam. The system tracks hand gestures for selection, movement, and release of virtual objects, creating an intuitive and touchless interaction experience.
features: Real-time hand tracking and gesture recognition

projects.title: Face Mesh using Python
projects.description: A computer vision application that creates detailed facial landmark detection for various applications including AR filters and facial analysis.
projects.longDescription: Face Mesh is a sophisticated facial landmark detection system that identifies and tracks 468 different points on the human face in real-time. This detailed mapping enables applications in augmented reality, facial analysis, expression tracking, and more. The project uses MediaPipe and OpenCV to achieve high-accuracy facial point detection even under various lighting conditions and head poses.

projects.title: 3D Solar System Scene using OpenGL
projects.description: An interactive 3D simulation of the solar system with realistic planet movements using OpenGL.
projects.longDescription: This project creates a visually stunning and physically accurate representation of our solar system using OpenGL. Planets orbit the sun following accurate orbital periods and rotations, with realistic texturing and lighting effects. The simulation allows users to explore the solar system from different perspectives and includes information about celestial bodies.

projects.title: Exam Scheduler Generator Using Genetic Algorithm
projects.description: An intelligent exam scheduling system that uses genetic algorithms to optimize exam timetables considering various constraints.
projects.longDescription: The Exam Scheduler tackles the complex problem of creating conflict-free exam timetables using genetic algorithms. It considers constraints such as room availability, course conflicts, instructor schedules, and student loads to generate optimal exam schedules. The system adapts to different institutional requirements and can handle large-scale scheduling problems efficiently.

projects.title: AI Based Chess Game Using Minimax
projects.description: An intelligent chess game implementation featuring an AI opponent powered by the Minimax algorithm and Alpha-Beta pruning.
projects.longDescription: This AI-powered chess game implements the Minimax algorithm with Alpha-Beta pruning to create a challenging computer opponent. The AI evaluates possible moves several steps ahead and selects optimal plays based on board evaluation functions. Players can adjust difficulty levels, analyze game states, and improve their chess skills against different AI strategies.

projects.title: Password Cracker using Brute Force Algorithm
projects.description: A demonstration tool that showcases password vulnerability through brute force methods for educational purposes.
projects.longDescription: This password cracker demonstrates the vulnerability of weak passwords by implementing various brute force algorithms. Designed for educational purposes, it helps users understand the importance of strong password practices by showing how quickly simple passwords can be compromised. The project includes different attack strategies and performance optimizations for demonstration purposes only.
